remarks: Change the bound variable of a proper substitution into a class using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
statement:
cbvcsbv.1 $e |- ( x = y -> B = C ) $.
cbvcsbv $p |- [_ A / x ]_ B = [_ A / y ]_ C $.
$d B y $.
$d C x $.
$d x y $.
